entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
